comments.text:
I was right-clicking on the Home button in Firefox, thinking I could open the home page in a new tab that way.  Nope; I got the standard menubar context menu.

This could be a simple bug for someone that just wants to override the context menu, but it could also be a place to prototype inserting menu items and separators into an existing context menu by JavaScript...
